objects.text:
Luxurious Woody Aromatic
Sandalwood & Leather Notes
Eau de Parfum • 3.4 FL.OZ
Handcrafted in New York

product_details.description: Launched by the design house of Le Labo in the year 2011. This woody aromatic fragrance has a blend of sandalwood, leather, papyrus, cedar, cardamom, violet, iris, and amber notes. It is long lasting fragrance. Launched by the design house of Le Labo in the year 2011 This woody aromatic fragrance has a blend of sandalwood, leather, papyrus, cedar, cardamom, violet, iris, and amber notes It is long lasting fragrance Brand - Le Labo ** Item Form - EDP Spray ** Item Volume - 50 Milliliters ** Scent - Sandalwood ** Special Feature - Long lasting **

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, luxurious layout with a soft gradient background formed by overlapping diagonal designs and faint decorative textures. The composition highlights the perfume product, combining sophisticated typography and a clear call-to-action.

At the top left, the brand name ("brand") is displayed in an elegant sans-serif font in a muted taupe color. Below it, a bold and prominent heading ("heading") captures attention with a large-sized dark brown serif type. Accompanying this is a product description ("description") in a smaller font offering aromatic details of the product.

Underneath, a subheadline ("tagline") reinforces the luxury appeal, followed by a rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") with contrasting white uppercase text ("cta"). On the right side, the actual product image ("product_image")—a perfume bottle and box—is prominently placed, balancing the text-heavy left section. A thin decorative line ("decorative") provides a subtle break between header and body text, enhancing visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige: #F7F4EF
- Warm Sand: #E8DFD3
- Deep Brown: #3C2415
- Muted Taupe: #73604E
- Highlight White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The Le Labo Santal 33 product image uses a minimalist, earthy color palette that conveys sophistication and artisanal quality. The key colors include kraft brown (#C69C6D) from the box, used to evoke natural, handmade aesthetics; soft off-white (#F5F5F0) on the label, creating contrast without being harsh; charcoal black (#2D2D2D) for text, ensuring strong readability; muted silver (#B3B3B3) on the bottle cap for modern elegance; and translucent glass tones (#EDECEB) reflecting the product's purity. These colors are not overly blended but rather juxtaposed cleanly, emphasizing a refined and purposeful design direction ideal for high-end advertising banners.
